original_title: Isaac Asimov: Voyage to the Outer Planets & Beyond
overview: Travel to the edges of our solar system with this unique blend of photographic images, video and computer animation. Hosted by renowned scientist and author Isaac Asimov, the program is set to Gustav Holst's moving 1917 musical suite "The Planets." The infrequently seen footage from NASA includes images of planets and other impressive galactic bodies, including Jupiter, Saturn's rings, Pluto and much more.
title: Isaac Asimov: Voyage to the Outer Planets & Beyond
